sentences.en: A young woman suckling a baby is one of life's most natural and delightful scenes.
sentences.cn: 年轻女性哺育婴儿是生命中最自然、最令人愉悦的一幕。

sentences.en: Altogether, it was a delightful town garden, peaceful and secluded.
sentences.cn: 总体上说，这是个令人愉快的城市花园，宁静而偏僻。

sentences.en: He played a delightful melody on his flute.
sentences.cn: 他用笛子吹奏了欢快的曲调.

sentences.en: I love the delightful odour of freshly roasted coffee beans.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢新烘咖啡豆的清香气味.

sentences.en: Is it not delightful to have friends coming from afar?
sentences.cn: 有朋自远方来,不亦乐乎?

sentences.en: It was the most delightful garden I had ever seen.
sentences.cn: 这是我所见过的最惹人喜爱的花园。

sentences.en: On the aeroplane I was befriended by a delightful German woman.
sentences.cn: 在飞机上，一位讨人喜欢的德国女士对我就像朋友一样。

sentences.en: Peter played a delightful melody on his flute.
sentences.cn: 彼得用笛子吹奏了一支欢快的曲子.
在社交场合我觉得与他相处非常愉快。

sentences.en: The Dart is a delightful river with a profusion of wild flowers along its banks.
sentences.cn: 达特河是一条令人心旷神怡的河，岸边到处开着野花。

sentences.en: There are some delightful Victorian houses fronting onto the pavement.
sentences.cn: 面对人行道有一些漂亮的维多利亚时代的房子。

sentences.en: We had a delightful time by the seashore last Sunday.
sentences.cn: 上星期天我们在海滨玩得真痛快.

sentences.en: We had a delightful time talking about the olden days on his farm.
sentences.cn: 我们兴高采烈地聊起了在他农场度过的那段往昔时光。

words.tran_cn: 使…兴高采烈；感到快乐（delight的过去分词）
